author: jgm
content: FYI for anyone using Vouch on goerli, version 1.8.0-beta.1 has been released with support for Deneb.  Release is available at https://github.com/attestantio/vouch/releases/tag/v1.8.0-beta.1

author: parithosh
content:
Goerli-shadowfork-2 is live with some basic tooling, found here: https://dencun-gsf-2.ethpandaops.io/
We tested the latest client releases recommended for Goerli as per the EF Blogpost. We have a stable network with blob spamming. 

Do let us know if there's something specific you'd like to see on the network. If not, we'd tear it down tomorrow morning.

author: sproul
content: no blockv3 yet if I interpret correctly? I'm eager to test Vouch + LH with blockv3, but that can wait a few more releases üòÅ

author: jgm
content: Nope, but I'd like to have it in prior to the actual 1.8.0 release now that there are client releases with the functionality.
